text: Park Ju-won (; born 19 October 1990) is a South Korean footballer who plays as goalkeeper for Daejeon Citizen in K League 2. ==Career== He was selected by Daejeon Citizen in the 2013 K League draft. He made his debut in the FA Cup match against Mokpo City on 9 April 2014. ==References== == External links == * Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:South Korean footballers Category:Daejeon Hana Citizen FC players Category:Asan Mugunghwa FC players Category:K League 1 players Category:K League 2 players
title: Park Ju-won
